Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat>The carvings of all those heroes—they're
really something. Such craftsmanship.

They were carved right into the mountain
<clr:0000>northwest <clr:ffff>of here to protect <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>.

What I'd like to do is hang up a painting
of the Champion <clr:0000>Daruk<clr:ffff>. His carving is up
there at the highest point.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Hmm, but I'll need to go get a look at it
if I'm going to paint it. I just don't have
time for that.
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Thanks to you, Link, the stable's whole
feel has changed completely.

May Daruk's divine strength protect
everyone who visits this stable.
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>What's this?<sp:5:0:0> Did you bring me a <clr:0000>picture of
the Daruk sculpture<clr:ffff>?!
Talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Well, the mountain path that leads to
the <clr:0000>northwest <clr:ffff>from here connects with
Goron City.
But the road's been busted up since
the Upheaval and isn't used much.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>These days, it's mostly just a den for
monsters—and a dangerous one at that.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You may want to take a safer route to
Goron City.

If so, I recommend you head south along
the road, turn to the west, and then take
the mountain path from Woodland Stable.
DoNotWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Sir, has that caught your eye?<sp:5:0:0> Attractive,
isn't it?<sp:5:0:0> It's called a <clr:0000>ring garland<clr:ffff>.

They're sold in a place called <clr:0000>Kakariko
Village<clr:ffff>. It's in a mountain range to the
south of here.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>The shape of the garland is supposed to
bring good luck. You might say it's the
inn's lucky charm.
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>You seem very focused on this garland.
Perhaps you should just go buy one
for yourself, hm?
Head to the mountains south of here
and you'll find them for sale in
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Chat_00>If I had a <clr:0000>picture <clr:ffff>I could use as reference,
I'm certain I could do up a painting, quick
and easy.
DoNotWakka_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>Sir! Please!<sp:5:0:0> Just because you want it
doesn't mean you can just up and
take it like that.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>They're sold in a place called <clr:0000>Kakariko
Village<clr:ffff>, off in a mountain range to the
south of here.
If you'd like one, please go and buy
one yourself.
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>If you happen to have a <clr:0000>picture of the
Daruk sculpture<clr:ffff>, well, I hope you'll
show it to me.
Talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Now that I think about it, Link,<sp:5:0:0> I hear
that things in <clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff> aren't
so good right now.
Word is some goopy stuff called <clr:0000>sludge <clr:ffff>is
falling out of the sky.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Zora's Domain is to the <clr:0000>southeast <clr:ffff>of here,
and a bit out of the way.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Still, I can't help but worry this sludge will
start falling from the sky here too.
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I have to say, I'm quite proud of how this
turned out! *sigh* It was so much fun to
paint again after all this time.
In fact, I'm enjoying this so much that if
you end up with a different <clr:0000>picture of
the Daruk sculpture<clr:ffff>, please let me know.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'll be sure to paint that one too and
hang it in the frame!
Talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, something else, Link...<sp:5:0:0>


I heard rumors that the horse god moved
to<clr:0000> Akkala<clr:ffff>.

Talk is he can resurrect dead horses. Just
the kinda thing you'd expect of a god.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I can't help but think things would've
gotten a lot livelier around this stable
if he'd come by here.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>Aw, don't listen to me. I should stop
complaining about things I can't change.<sp:5:1:0>
Back to work, back to work!
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>It captures the essence of the renowned
Champion, don't you think? You can really
sense Daruk's strength, even here.
Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat>We get a lot of customers stopping by this
stable on their way to visit Goron City.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>So I've been thinking it might be nice
for them if I hung up a <clr:0000>picture of the
Daruk sculpture<clr:ffff> overlooking the city.
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease>You can really feel the power overflowing
from this painting.

It's almost as if the Champion Daruk is
watching over us.
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway,<sp:5:0:0> is there something you'd like to
do with the <clr:0000>Daruk-sculpture painting<clr:ffff>?
Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now, since this is your first time here with
us at <clr:0000>Foothill Stable<clr:ffff>...
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Since this is your very first time at
<clr:0000>Foothill Stable<clr:ffff>, and you've also
<clr:0000>registered a horse<clr:ffff>...
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>We're a stepping-stone for folks who want
to do some sightseeing in <clr:0000>Goron City <clr:ffff>off
to the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>.
So, I was thinking, maybe I'll hang a
painting of the sculpture of the Goron
Champion, <clr:0000>Daruk<clr:ffff>.
You know...<sp:5:0:0>the big statue that's sculpted
into the mountain overlooking the city.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> but I'll need to go get a look at it if
I'm going to paint it. And there's just no
time for that.
If I had some kind of <clr:0000>image<clr:ffff> to use as
reference,<sp:5:0:0> well, it'd be no problem to
paint up something nice for the wall here.
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Seeing as this marks not only your first
time visiting us at <clr:0000>Foothill Stable<clr:ffff> but
your first time <clr:0000>lodging <clr:ffff>here as well...
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Hold on!<sp:5:0:0> You have a <clr:0000>picture of the
Daruk sculpture<clr:ffff>?
